marketing.planTrackManage: Plan, track, and manage your travel
marketing.description: Attraction is a flexible mobility management platform that helps you plan, track, and manage your travel. Whether you're a business traveler or a leisure traveler, Attraction has the tools you need to make your travel experience seamless and enjoyable.
marketing.heroDescription: Revolutionary platform that connects all your transportation needs in one seamless experience. Plan smarter, travel better, live more.
marketing.trustedBy: Trusted by thousands of travelers worldwide

features.title: Everything you need for perfect travel
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to make your mobility experience effortless

smartPlanning.title: Smart Planning
smartPlanning.description: AI-powered route optimization that learns your preferences and suggests the best travel options.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Stay informed with live traffic, delays, and alternative routes to keep you moving.

multiModal.title: Multi-modal Transport
multiModal.description: Seamlessly combine different transport modes for the most efficient journey.

carbonFootprint.title: Carbon Tracking
carbonFootprint.description: Monitor and reduce your environmental impact with detailed carbon footprint analytics.

offlineAccess.title: Offline Access
offlineAccess.description: Access your travel plans and maps even without internet connection.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Share itineraries and coordinate travel plans with your team or family.

cta.title: Ready to transform your travel?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands who have already made the switch to smarter mobility
